about_the_game:
After years of decline, civilization has finally collapsed. The remnants of society live in ruins, and the most important task for reconstruction has fallen to the military: the transportation of resources. You are a pilot in the army's MDM unit, and you must control the most advanced transport platform ever built through various levels to deliver materials and personnel to aid in reconstruction. But what happens if you fail? Nothing, just take another ship and try again.

The mechanics are simple: you have two powerful engines on the left and right, which allow you to tilt your ship to one side or the other as you battle against gravity to avoid crashing. But watch your fuel!

  • Pick up and transport different loads from one point to another while progressing through the various maps. Increase your chances of success by collecting various aids scattered across the maps, such as shield or fuel refills.
  • Avoid obstacles, enemy weapons, or vehicles you encounter, and even challenge final bosses using the environment as a weapon.
  • Find configuration modules to increase the points available in the garages, allowing you to configure the features to your liking or according to the current mission: load capacity, speed, tilt angle, fuel, etc. You decide.
